about_the_game:
"

ICONS Presents


Iconic Inspiration to Up Your Game!


Icons Presents is a supplement for the fun and fast-playing
Icons Superpowered Roleplaying , offering new options, essays, and resources for playing and modifying the game. It includes:

  • Options! Ways to modify the game to suit your style and preferences, including different classes of villains, situational qualities, dice-rolling, and initiative variants.

  • Resources! Time-saving resources for the Game Master, like information on military forces, how to create and run better villains, rare and unusual materials, and more.

  • Genres! Looks at how to customize games from martial arts mayhem to swords and sorcery, from playing vigilantes to portraying villains, from mythic deities to the cosmic space patrol.

  • Scenarios! Comic book storytelling techniques and looks at classic scenarios like world conquest and destruction and how to run them.

Icons Presents offers a wealth of useful resources and ideas for your
Icons game, giving you a range of tools to help make the game your own and create the kind of series you want to run or play in. Use some of them or all of them however you wish. "
